attributes.action: Make all sanctions on e-cigarettes the same as cigarettes, see below
attributes.additional_details: Cigarettes cause cancer. Lung cancer kills over 40,000 people in the UK every year. This will increase. We need to discourage them.
attributes.background: Do not allow advertising in the UK of vape sticks and e cigarettes. Introduce a higher tax on cigarettes, to use in NHS support organisations, and increase the minimum age to buy cigarettes to 21.
